ssot__AgentServicePresence__dlm.name: Agent Service Presence
ssot__AgentServicePresence__dlm.description: The Agent Service Presence DMO represents a user's real-time presence status.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the agent service presence DMO.

ssot__AtCapacityDuration__c.description: The duration a service agent was at capacity.

ssot__AverageCapacity__c.description: The average capacity for a service agent.

ssot__IsAway__c.description: An indicator if a service agent is away.

ssot__ConfiguredCapacity__c.description: The configured capacity for a service agent.

ssot__IsCurrentState__c.description: An indicator of the current state of a service agent.

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId___c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Description__c.description: The description for the service agent presence.

ssot__IdleDuration__c.description: The duration a service agent was idle.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the agent service presence.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of a service agent.

ssot__ServicePresenceStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to the status of the agent service presence.

ssot__StatusDuration__c.description: The duration a service agent status lasted.

ssot__StatusEndDate__c.description: The date a service agent status ended.

ssot__StatusStartDate__c.description: The date a service agent status started.

ssot__UserId__c.description: A reference Id to the agent service presence user.
